lettings.views

Views for the lettings application.

This module defines the views used in the lettings application, including index and letting views.

Functions

index(request)

Display the list of lettings.

letting(request, letting_id)

Display a letting.
lettings.views.index(request)

Display the list of lettings.

Parameters:

request (HttpRequest) – The HTTP request object.

Returns:

The rendered HTML response.

Return type:

HttpResponse

lettings.views.letting(request, letting_id)

Display a letting.

Parameters:

  • request (HttpRequest) – The HTTP request object.

  • letting_id (int) – The ID of the letting to display.

Returns:

The rendered HTML response.

Return type:

HttpResponse
